newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentine aluminum maker Aluar year net $105.2 mln.
newsitem.headline: Argentine aluminum maker Aluar year net $105.2 mln.

text.p: NOTE - Yearly results include an extraordinary gain of $9 million.
To June 30, retained earnings stood at $108.2 million and net worth at $466.3 million.
The company provided no forth quarter results or comparative yearly results.

The board proposed to pay a six percent cash dividend on preferred stocks, equivalent to $4.2 million and to leave up to the shareholders meeting the final decision on what to do with $98.6 million in accumulated earnings.
The company did not say when the shareholders meeting would take place.
Full company name is Aluar Aluminio Argentino.
